data.name: Home_Sessions

data.name: Settings_ProvidersDescription
data.value: Configure the API providers you want to use with Dao Studio.

data.value: Add a provider to get started with Dao Studio

data.name: People_NoPeopleDescription
data.value: Add your first person to start using them with this application

data.name: Settings_Version_UpdatesDescription
data.value: Keep your application up to date with the latest features and security improvements.

data.name: People_ProvidersRequired
data.value: You must add at least one provider before adding people.

data.comment: Title format for the person edit dialog, where {0} is the person name

data.comment: Label indicating the tools selected for a person

data.comment: Section header for the basic information in the add/edit person dialog

data.comment: Section header for the capabilities and tools selection in the add/edit person dialog

data.name: People_UseAllTools
data.comment: Checkbox label for enabling all tools for a person

data.name: Tools_SelectToolsDescription
data.value: Select the tools that this person can use
data.comment: Description text for the tool selection dialog

data.name: Tools_NoToolsDescription
data.value: Tools allow LLMs to perform additional tasks like searching the web, accessing files, or running code.

data.comment: Tooltip for the delete tool button

data.name: Tools_ConfigureTool
data.comment: Tooltip for the configure tool button

data.name: Tools_AddToolError
data.value: An error occurred while adding the tool: {0}
data.comment: Error message when adding a tool from a plugin fails. {0} is the exception message.

data.name: Common_Error
data.comment: Generic term for Error dialog title

data.name: People_CurrentModel
data.comment: Label for displaying the currently selected Model ID

data.name: People_Catalog
data.comment: Label for the catalog selection in person configuration

data.name: People_ModelSelection
data.comment: Label for the model selection section

data.name: People_AllCatalogs
data.comment: Label for showing all catalogs option

data.name: People_NameRequired
data.comment: Error message shown when person name is missing

data.name: People_ProviderRequired
data.comment: Error message shown when provider is missing

data.comment: Error message shown when person ID is missing

data.comment: Title for person deletion confirmation dialog

data.value: Are you sure you want to delete "{0}"? This action cannot be undone.
data.comment: Confirmation message for person deletion. {0} is the person name.

data.name: Home_NoSessionsAvailable
data.value: No chat history available. Click on a person to get started.
data.comment: Text shown when no sessions are available

data.value: Click on person to start chat

data.name: Chat_VoiceRecordingDescription

data.name: Tools_DefaultPluginName
data.comment: Default name used for plugins when no display name is provided

data.name: Tools_UnknownModel
data.comment: Text shown for unknown model with ID placeholder

data.name: Usage_Information
data.value: Token usage is updated in real-time as you interact with the AI. This information helps you track your consumption and optimize your prompts.

data.name: Tools_PluginNotFound_Format
data.comment: Parameter 0 is tool name, Parameter 1 is plugin StaticId

data.name: Tools_ConfigNotImplemented_Format
data.value: Configuration for '{0}' is not implemented by the plugin.
data.comment: Parameter 0 is tool name

data.name: Tools_ConfigError_Format
data.comment: Parameter 0 is tool name, Parameter 1 is error message

data.name: Tools_ConfigGeneralError_Format
data.value: A general error occurred while showing tool configuration for '{0}': {1}

data.name: Tools_ConfirmDeleteTool
data.comment: Title for tool deletion confirmation dialog

data.name: Tools_ConfirmDeleteToolMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete "{0}"? This action cannot be undone.
data.comment: Confirmation message for tool deletion. {0} is the tool name.

data.name: Update_CheckForUpdates
data.comment: Menu item text for checking for application updates

data.name: Update_CheckingForUpdates
data.comment: Status text shown while checking for updates

data.name: Update_NoUpdatesAvailable
data.comment: Message shown when no updates are found

data.name: Update_UpdateAvailable
data.comment: Message shown when an update is available. {0} is the version number.

data.name: Update_UpdateCheckError
data.comment: Error message shown when update check fails. {0} is the error message.

data.name: Settings_AutoResolveToolNameConflictsDescription
data.value: When multiple tools have functions with the same name, automatically add prefixes to make them unique. If disabled, conflicts will trigger an error message.

data.name: Error_ToolNameConflictDetected
data.value: Tool function name conflicts detected for '{0}' in module '{1}'. Please rename conflicting functions or enable auto-resolution in settings.

data.name: Home_GettingStarted_Title
data.comment: Title for the getting started guide

data.name: Home_GettingStarted_Description
data.value: Let's help you get set up to start. Follow these simple steps:
data.comment: Description for the getting started guide

data.name: Home_GettingStarted_Step1
data.comment: Step 1 prefix text

data.name: Home_GettingStarted_Step1_Link
data.comment: Clickable link text for API Provider

data.name: Home_GettingStarted_Step1_Suffix
data.value: to connect to your preferred AI service
data.comment: Step 1 suffix text

data.name: Home_GettingStarted_Step2
data.comment: Step 2 prefix text

data.name: Home_GettingStarted_Step2_Link
data.comment: Clickable link text for Person

data.name: Home_GettingStarted_Step2_Suffix
data.value: with the personality and capabilities you want
data.comment: Step 2 suffix text

data.name: Home_GettingStarted_Step3
data.comment: Step 3 prefix text

data.name: Home_GettingStarted_Step3_Link
data.comment: Clickable link text for Tools

data.name: Home_GettingStarted_Step3_Suffix
data.value: to give your AI agents special abilities, or simply start chatting right away!
data.comment: Step 3 suffix text

data.name: People_LLMParameters
data.comment: Tab header for LLM parameters configuration

data.name: People_Temperature
data.comment: Label for temperature parameter

data.name: People_TemperatureTooltip
data.value: Controls randomness in responses. Higher values (e.g., 0.8) make output more creative, while lower values (e.g., 0.2) make it more focused and deterministic. Range: 0.0 to 2.0
data.comment: Tooltip explaining temperature parameter

data.name: People_TemperatureWatermark
data.comment: Watermark text for temperature input

data.name: People_TopP
data.comment: Label for top-p parameter

data.name: People_TopPTooltip
data.value: Controls diversity via nucleus sampling. Only tokens with cumulative probability up to top_p are considered. Range: 0.0 to 1.0. Lower values focus on more likely tokens.
data.comment: Tooltip explaining top-p parameter

data.name: People_TopPWatermark
data.comment: Watermark text for top-p input

data.name: People_TopK
data.comment: Label for top-k parameter

data.name: People_TopKTooltip
data.value: Limits sampling to the K most likely tokens. Lower values make responses more focused. Typical range: 1 to 100.
data.comment: Tooltip explaining top-k parameter

data.name: People_TopKWatermark
data.comment: Watermark text for top-k input

data.name: People_PresencePenalty
data.comment: Label for presence penalty parameter

data.name: People_PresencePenaltyTooltip
data.value: Penalizes tokens that have already appeared in the text. Higher values encourage the model to talk about new topics. Range: -2.0 to 2.0
data.comment: Tooltip explaining presence penalty parameter

data.name: People_PresencePenaltyWatermark
data.comment: Watermark text for presence penalty input

data.name: People_FrequencyPenalty
data.comment: Label for frequency penalty parameter

data.name: People_FrequencyPenaltyTooltip
data.value: Penalizes tokens based on how frequently they appear in the text. Higher values reduce repetition. Range: -2.0 to 2.0
data.comment: Tooltip explaining frequency penalty parameter

data.name: People_FrequencyPenaltyWatermark
data.comment: Watermark text for frequency penalty input

data.name: People_HttpHeaders
data.comment: Label for HTTP headers input

data.name: People_HttpHeadersTooltip
data.value: HTTP headers as key-value pairs, one per line. Example: "HTTP-Referer: https://example.com"
data.comment: Tooltip explaining HTTP headers format

data.name: People_HttpHeadersWatermark
data.comment: Watermark example for HTTP headers

data.name: People_AdditionalContent
data.comment: Label for additional content input

data.name: People_AdditionalContentTooltip
data.value: JSON object with additional content properties. Example shown in the watermark.
data.comment: Tooltip explaining additional content JSON

data.name: People_AdditionalContentWatermark
data.comment: Multiline JSON example for Additional Content watermark
